original_title: Sports Misconduct Prevention Police Unit summons Pramodya Wickramasinghe over revelations about SLC
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Cricket Selection Committee Chairman Pramodya Wickramasinghe was summoned to the Sports Misconduct Prevention Police Unit today.
This was to record statements on a revelation he made recently.
Pramodya Wickramasinghe last Monday (13) issued a statement declaring the reasons SLC is in crisis at the present.
He was summoned by the Special Investigation Sports Misconduct Prevention Police Unit to inquire into more details on this revelation.
Army steps-in to issue tickets at expressways as ticket officers go on strike
